resources.string: Please enter a valid card number
Select the Bluetooth Reader from the list below
Bluetooth Reader ready to be linked
Attempting to automatically find and link the Bluetooth Reader.
If you\'re having problems connecting, try the resetting the Bluetooth Reader:
Turn the Bluetooth Reader off. Do this by pressing the ON/OFF switch for several seconds until no lights are blinking
Turn the Bluetooth Reader back on. Press and hold the Bluetooth reader\'s ON switch for 7 seconds or until you see a flashing, blue light
Welcome to the Bluetooth reader linking wizard.
To get started, press and hold the Bluetooth reader\'s ON switch for 7 seconds or until you see a flashing, blue light.
If the device does not appear, be sure that the Bluetooth reader is turned ON.
Find and tap on the device that contains \'BT Mag\'.
